CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 23, reads: "Proper Shade - Miss Juanita Mitchner, right, of Carmen Murphy's House of Beauty Cosmetics of Detroit selectes the proper shades of beauty products for an interested homemaker as Business Manager Floyd Caver and Mrs. Agnes Dixon, one of the Pittsburgh representatives, prepare for a demonstration."
TitMainTitle: Juanita Mitchner, on right, assists Floyd Caver with the selection of cosmetics, Agnes Dixon seated nearby, at the House of Beauty Cosmetics booth in Ammon Center for 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Ammon Center (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Gymnasiums--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Mitchner, Juanita.Dixon, Agnes.Caver, Floyd.
